name: Painting Restore
body:
### Painting Restore
PaintingRestore is a mobile (android) application that acts as a restoring lens for paintings in exhibitions. Simply point the camera to the distorted painting of interest, and the restored painting (as it looked originally) will be overlay-ed over the image, exactly in the angle/orientation you view it from!

### Reports and Demo
- [Presentation](https://github.com/rohitgirdhar/PaintingRestore/blob/master/report/Rohit_RestoringLens.pptx?raw=true)
- [Demo Video](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DZq3EXAKKjA)

### Authors and Contributors
Developed by Rohit Girdhar (@rohitgirdhar)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
